title: Vijjuxtra
author: Vijjuxtra
content: BUYING BTC FROM ANY COUNTRY THROUGH DIRECT BANK TRANSFERBTC 1:1 RATIO(CURRENT TRADING PRICE AFTER ARRIVAL)USDT 1:1 RATIOBTC MAY TAKE 200+ CONFIRMATIONS APPROX 1 & HALF HOUR TO DEPOSIT INTO MY WALLETANATHER HALF HOUR TO PROCESS AND CALCULATE PRICEÂ  BUY BTC FROM YOU WITH DIRECT BANK TRANSFER MIN VALUE 5000$ USDÂ PLEASE DONT WASTE TIME IF YOU ARE FUD YOU CAN ASK FOR MY WALLET ADDRESS IN REPLY ANY BANK CHARGES FROM YOUR BANK END AN BE BARED BY YOUYOU CAN ASK MY BINANCEC ID IF YOU DOUBTBANK TRANSFERS MAY TAKE 1 TO 5 BUSINESS DAYS PLEASE BE PATIENCE THE VALUE OF BTC WILL BE AL

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: This smells like all sorts of roadkill. 200 confirmations, not 6? No escrow?SWIFT transfers?Half hour to process and calculate price?What?Can you please post a new topic when you're not 9 vodka bottles deep?

comments.author: Edwardard
comments.body: Quote from: Vijjuxtra on January 26, 2023, 01:59:36 PMBTC MAY TAKE 200+ CONFIRMATIONS APPROX 1 & HALF HOUR TO DEPOSIT INTO MY WALLETLol btw it doesnt take just 1 and half hours for 200 confirmations. In that time limit, you only get max uptoÂ  4-5 confirmations, and sometimes not even one (if you pay lower miner fees).Just to let you know it'll take between 2-4days for it to reach 200 confirmations.Quote from: Vijjuxtra on January 26, 2023, 01:59:36 PMPLEASE DONT WASTE TIME IF YOU ARE FUDFirst of all, stop posting with all those capital letters. It hurts to the eyes. If we are fud, you seem like a stupid troll. Whats your age ? lol.Quote from: Vijjuxtra on January 26, 2023, 01:59:36 PMTHE VALUE OF BTC WILL BE ALNow what is AL? aluminium based btc? ðŸ˜†

comments.author: bittraffic
comments.body: There is no need for half an hour or asking your binance ID to remove doubts. The terms you have doesn't make it attractive to the doubtful users and the majority here are going to assume you as a scam. You have a bank account, you can go p2p without issue.Quote from: Edwardard on January 27, 2023, 02:37:05 AMQuote from: Vijjuxtra on January 26, 2023, 01:59:36 PMPLEASE DONT WASTE TIME IF YOU ARE FUDFirst of all, stop posting with all those capital letters. It hurts to the eyes. If we are fud, you seem like a stupid troll. Whats your age ? lol.Â  I wonder how old he is too, he misunderstood the word fud.

comments.author: Vijjuxtra
comments.body: ActuallyÂ  please be to the point none of your replies are to the point someone is behind my word FUD, AGE,and my 9 vodka,Actually you know atleast what I want to buy even then none of you like to to enquire about trade if I had posted this ad on p2p I would had few deals till now p2p is not enabled for me on binance it requires follows & certain conditions so I m here to trade freely I posted the wrong words sorry, but my intention is fulfilled as you understood what I wanted to say... But if you like to trade do serious enquiries:--- thank you for your time

comments.author: bnbstorm
comments.body: Quote from: Vijjuxtra on January 26, 2023, 01:59:36 PMBUYING BTC FROM ANY COUNTRY THROUGH DIRECT BANK TRANSFERBTC 1:1 RATIO(CURRENT TRADING PRICE AFTER ARRIVAL)USDT 1:1 RATIOBTC MAY TAKE 200+ CONFIRMATIONS APPROX 1 & HALF HOUR TO DEPOSIT INTO MY WALLETANATHER HALF HOUR TO PROCESS AND CALCULATE PRICE Â BUY BTC FROM YOU WITH DIRECT BANK TRANSFER MIN VALUE 5000$ USDÂ PLEASE DONT WASTE TIME IF YOU ARE FUD YOU CAN ASK FOR MY WALLET ADDRESS IN REPLY ANY BANK CHARGES FROM YOUR BANK END AN BE BARED BY YOUYOU CAN ASK MY BINANCEC ID IF YOU DOUBTBANK TRANSFERS MAY TAKE 1 TO 5 BUSINESS DAYS PLEASE BE PATIENCE THE VALUE OF BTC WILL BE AL Multiple red flags. So we ask you for your btc address and transfer bitcoin funds to you. You will wait for 200 confirmations which will take a lot of time. Then you will transfer funds to our bank account in 5 to 6 days.Why would someone publicly post their bitcoin transactions and also post their bank account to tie their identity?Why would someone wait for 1 week time to sell their btc when there are multiple P2P exchanges with escrow available?What are benefits with trading with you if rate is 1:1 and seller sends funds first also seller have to pay all transfer fee. It seems a joke to me.

comments.body: I m not interested in sharing my previous experience I just want trade in btc with competative rates which are profitable
